name: Przemytnik
overview: Przemytnik (smuggler) is a trading game. The protagonist of the game is Kurt von Karnova. After arriving at one of the emperor's planets he was arrested by the Imperial Guard. The governor gives him a simple choice: either Kurt releases the emperor's daughter kidnapped by the rebels or he will spend the rest of his life in prison. In order to accomplish the mission Kurt has to get funding for the purchase of armed spaceship. For this purpose Kurt has to move around the planets, collect information and trade in goods.
